labelLink.label: Total noncurrent assets of the economic entity
Assets Held for Sale
Assets [Roll Up]
Total assets of the economic entity
Assets
Equity = Equity Attributable to Parent + Equity Attributable to Noncontrolling Interest
BS1
Assets = Liabilities and Equity
BS2
Assets = Current Assets + Noncurrent Assets (classified balance sheet)
BS3
Liabilities = Current Liabilities + Noncurrent Liabilities (classified balance sheet)
BS4
Liabilities and Equity = Liabilities + Commitments and Contingencies + Temporary Equity + Equity
BS5
Balance Sheet [Abstract]
Balance Sheet, Classified [Table]
Balance sheet date of the most current balance sheet of the financial report
Balance Sheet Date
Format of the balance sheet including classified, unclassified, liquidity based
Balance Sheet Format
Balance Sheet [Line Items]
Balance Sheet, Unclassified [Table]
Basic Information [Line Items]
Basic Information [Table]
Similar to Costs and Expenses but generally only used by insurance companies.
Benefits, Costs, and Expenses
Net Cash Flow = Net Cash Flows, Operating + Net Cash Flows, Investing + Net Cash Flows, Financing + Exchange Gains (Losses)
CF1
Net Cash Flows, Continuing = Net Cash Flows, Operating, Continuing + Net Cash Flows, Investing, Continuing + Net Cash Flows, Financing, Continuing
CF2
Net Cash Flows, Discontinued = Net Cash Flows, Operating, Discontinued + Net Cash Flows, Investing, Discontinued + Net Cash Flows, Financing, Discontinued
CF3
Net Cash Flows, Operating = Net Cash Flows, Operating, Continuing + Net Cash Flows, Operating, Discontinued
CF4
Net Cash Flows, Investing = Net Cash Flows, Investing, Continuing + Net Cash Flows, Investing, Discontinued
CF5
Net Cash Flows, Financing = Net Cash Flows, Financing, Continuing + Net Cash Flows, Financing, Discontinued
CF6
Capitalization [Roll Up]
Total capitalization of an economic entity which includes its long-term debt and equity
Capitalization
Cash Flow Statement [Abstract]
Cash Flow Statement [Line Items]
Cash Flow Statement [Table]

Total commitments and contingencies of the economic entity; note that this fact generally never has a value and is reported as NIL; this concept is NOT used in the disclosures, only on the balance sheet
Commitments and Contingencies
Note that this concept is a CREDIT unlike the US GAAP XBRL Taxonomy where it is a DEBIT. This difference does negatively impact relations, it only changes how a relation is expressed.
Portion of comprehensive income (loss) attributable to noncontrolling interest.
Comprehensive Income (Loss) Attributable to Noncontrolling Interest
Portion of comprehensive income (loss) attributable to parent
Comprehensive Income (Loss) Attributable to Parent

Comprehensive Income (Loss) Breakdown [Table]
Comprehensive Income (Loss) [Roll Up]
Total comprehensive income (loss) of an economic entity including portions attributable to parent and noncontrolling interest
Comprehensive Income (Loss)
Total direct costs of revenue
Cost of Revenue, Goods
Total direct costs of revenue
Cost of Revenue, Services
Total direct costs of revenue
Cost of Revenue
Cost of Revenue [Roll Up]
Total of cost of revenue plus operating costs
Costs and Expenses
Costs and Expenses [Roll Up]
Total temporary equity of the economic entity; reported separately from redeemable noncontrolling interest
Current Assets, Excluding Held For Sale
Total current assets of the economic entity
Current Assets
Total temporary equity of the economic entity; reported separately from redeemable noncontrolling interest
Current Liabilities, Excluding Held For Sale
Total current liabilities of the economic entity
Current Liabilities
Type of financial report; for example, 10-K or 10-Q
Document Type
Identifier of economic entity which issued financial report which is the CIK number for SEC filings
Entity Central Index Key
Category of economic entity which issued financial report
Entity Filer Category
Name of the economic entity which issued financial report
Entity Registrant Name
Total equity attributable to the noncontrolling interest of the economic entity
Equity Attributable to Noncontrolling Interest
Total equity attributable to the parent of the economic entity
Equity Attributable to Parent
Equity [Roll Up]
Total equity of the economic entity
Equity
Total exchange gains (losses) from foriegn currency transactions
Exchange Gains (Losses)
Total direct costs of revenue
Excise and Sales Taxes
Total extraordinary items of income (expense), net of income taxes
Extraordinary Items of Income (Expense), Net of Tax
Fiscal period focus of financial report; for example 2012 or 2013
Fiscal Period Focus
Fiscal year end of economic entity issuing financial report
Fiscal Year End
Fiscal year focus of the financial report; for example, Q1, Q2, Q3, or FY
Fiscal Year Focus
Total fixed assets of the economic entity, generally property, plant, and equipment
Fixed Assets
Total gain (loss) on disposition of stock in subsitiary or equity method investee, generally used by REIT
Gain (Loss) on Disposition of Stock in Subsidiary or Equity Method Investee
Gain (Loss) on Sale of Previously Unissued Stock by Subsidiary or Equity Investee, Nonoperating Income
Gain (Loss) on Sale of Properties, Net of Tax
General Information [Hierarchy]
General Information [Line Items]
General Information [Table]
Gross Profit [Roll Up]
Total gross profit which is total revenues less total cost of revenues
Gross Profit
Comprehensive Income (Loss) = Net Income (Loss) + Other Comprehensive Income (Loss)
IS10
Operating Income (Loss) = Revenues - Costs And Expenses + Other Operating Income (Single-step approach)
IS11
Gross Profit = Revenues - Cost Of Revenue (Multi-step approach)
IS1
Operating Income (Loss) = Gross Profit - Operating Expenses + Other Operating Income (Multi-step approach)
IS2
Income (Loss) from Continuing Operations Before Equity Method Investments = Operating Income (Loss) + Nonoperating Income (Loss) - Interest And Debt Expense
IS3
Income (Loss) from Continuing Operations Before Tax = Income (Loss) from Continuing Operations Before Equity Method Investments + Income (Loss) from Equity Method Investments
IS4
Income (Loss) from Continuing Operations after Tax = Income (Loss) from Continuing Operations Before Tax - Income Tax Expense (Benefit)
IS5
Net Income (Loss) = Income (Loss) from Continuing Operations After Tax + Income (Loss) from Discontinued Operations, Net of Tax + Extraordinary Items, Gain (Loss)
IS6
Net Income (Loss) = Net Income (Loss) Attributable to Parent + Net Income (Loss) Attributable to Noncontrolling Interest
IS7
Net Income (Loss) Available to Common Stockholders, Basic = Net Income (Loss) Attributable to Parent - Preferred Stock Dividends and Other Adjustments
IS8
Comprehensive Income (Loss) = Comprehensive Income (Loss) Attributable to Parent + Comprehensive Income (Loss) Attributable to Noncontrolling Interest
IS9
Subtotal of income statement
Income (Loss) before Equity Method Investments
Income (Loss) from Continuing Operations After Tax [Roll Up]
Subtotal of the income statement; income (loss) continuing operations before tax less tax
Income (Loss) from Continuing Operations After Tax
Income (Loss) from Continuing Operations Before Tax [Roll Up]
Subtotal of the income statement
Income (Loss) from Continuing Operations Before Tax
Total income (loss) from discontinued operations net of any taxes
Income (Loss) from Discontinued Operations, Net of Tax, Adjustment to Prior Year Gain (Loss) on Disposal
Total income (loss) from discontinued operations net of any taxes
Income (Loss) from Discontinued Operations, Net of Tax, During Phase Out
Total income (loss) from discontinued operations net of any taxes
Income (Loss) from Discontinued Operations, Net of Tax, Gain (Loss) on Disposal
Total income (loss) from discontinued operations net of any taxes
Income (Loss) from Discontinued Operations, Net of Tax, Provision for Gain (Loss) on Disposal
Total income (loss) from discontinued operations net of any taxes
Income (Loss) from Discontinued Operations, Net of Tax
Total income (loss) from equity method investments
Income (Loss) from Equity Method Investments

Total income tax expense (benefit) including current and deferred portions
Income Tax Expense (Benefit)
Total combined operating and nonoperating costs and expenses; note that this concept does not currently exist in the US GAAP XBRL Taxonomy
Indirect Operating and Nonoperating Costs and Expenses
Total interest and debt expense
Interest and Debt Expense
Operating income and dividend income, generally related to interest-based revenues
Interest and Dividend Income, Operating
Total operating related interest expense, generally used by those reporting using interest-based revenues
Interest Expense, Operating
Interest expense, generally related to securities-based revenues
Interest Expense
Interest Income (Expense), After Provision for Losses [Roll Up]
Total interest income (expense) net of provision for losses, generally used by interest-based revenues
Interest Income (Expense) After Provision for Losses
Interest Income (Expense), Net [Roll Up]
Total operating income (expense), generally related to interest-based revenues
Interest Income (Expense), Operating, Net

Liabilities

Portion of net income (loss) attributable to noncontrolling interest
Net Income (Loss) Attributable to Noncontrolling Interest Plus Preferred Stock Dividends and Other Adjustments
Portion of net income (loss) attributable to noncontrolling interest
Net Income (Loss) Attributable to Noncontrolling Interest
Portion of net income (loss) attributable to noncontrolling interest
Net Income (Loss) Attributable to Nonredeemable Noncontrolling Interest
Portion of net income (loss) attributable to parent

Portion of net income (loss) attributable to noncontrolling interest
Net Income (Loss) Attributable to Redeemable Noncontrolling Interest
Net Income (Loss) Available to Common Breakdown [Line Items]
Net Income (Loss) Available to Common Breakdown [Table]
Net Income (Loss) Available to Common Stockholders, Basic [Roll Up]
Portion of net income (loss) available to common stockholders, basic, after removing all preferred dividends and other adjustments from net income (loss) attributable to parent
Net Income (Loss) Available to Common Stockholders, Basic
Net Income (Loss) Breakdown [Line Items]
Net Income (Loss) Breakdown [Table]
Net Income (Loss) [Roll Up]
Total net income (loss) including portions attributable to parent and noncontrolling interest
Net Income (Loss)
Total noncurrent assets of the economic entity
Noncurrent Assets
Total noncurrent assets of the economic entity
Noncurrent Liabilities
Total noninterest related expenses of an economic entity which uses interest-based revenues reporting style
Noninterest Expense
Total noninterest income reported by economic entity using interest-based revenues style
Noninterest Income
Total nonoperating gains (losses) reported by economic entities using securities-based revenues reporting style
Nonoperating Gains (Losses)
Total combined nonoperating income (loss) plus interest and debt expense reported by economic entity; note that this concept does not currently exist in the US GAAP XBRL Taxonomy
Nonoperating Income (Loss) Plus Interest and Debt Expense
Nonoperating Income (Loss) Plus Interest and Debt Expense Plus Income (Loss) from Equity Method Investments [Roll Up]
Total nonoperating income (loss) reported by an economic entity
Nonoperating Income (Loss)

Total combined nonoperating income (loss) plus interest and debt expense plus income (loss) from equity method investments; note that this concept does not currently exist in the US GAAP XBRL Taxonomy
Nonoperating Income (Loss) Plus Interest and Debt Expense Plus Income (Loss) from Equity Method Investments
Total combined operating and nonoperating costs and expenses; note that this concept does not currently exist in the US GAAP XBRL Taxonomy
Operating and Nonoperating Costs and Expenses
Total combined operating and nonoperating revenues; note that this concept does not currently exist in the US GAAP XBRL Taxonomy
Operating and Nonoperating Revenues
Total indirect operating expenses; excludes any direct costs of revenues
Operating Expenses
Operating Income (Loss) [Roll Up]
Subtotal which reports total operating income (loss) of economic entity
Operating Income (Loss)
Total other comprehensive income (loss) which reconciles net income (loss) to comprehensive income (loss)
Other Comprehensive Income (Loss) Attributable to Noncontrolling Interest
Total other comprehensive income (loss) which reconciles net income (loss) to comprehensive income (loss)
Other Comprehensive Income (Loss) Attributable to Parent
Total other comprehensive income (loss) which reconciles net income (loss) to comprehensive income (loss)
Other Comprehensive Income (Loss)
Other Information [Hierarchy]
Other Information [Line Items]
Other Information [Table]
Total other noncurrent assets of a regulated entity, excludes property, plant and equipment, current assets, and investments.
Other Noncurrent Assets of Regulated Entity
Total other noncurrent liabilities of regulated entity
Other Noncurrent Liabilities of Regulated Entity
Total of any other operating income (loss) which is included within operating income (loss)
Other Operating Income (Expenses)
Total of all other assets other than current assets and fixed assets; used when economic entity reports fixed assets
Other than Fixed Noncurrent Assets
Total of all preferred stock dividends or other adjustments; used to arrive at net income (loss) attributable to common stockholders, basic
Participating Securities, Distributed and Undistributed Earnings (Loss), Basic
Total of all preferred stock dividends or other adjustments; used to arrive at net income (loss) attributable to common stockholders, basic
Preferred Stock Dividends and Other Adjustments
Total provision for loan, lease, or any other losses; used by economic entity reporting using interest-based revenues style
Provision for Loan, Lease, and Other Losses
Total property, plant and equipment of a regulated public utility, net
Public Utilities Property, Plant, and Equipment, Net
Total redeemable noncontrolling interest which is reported separate from total temporary equity by an economic entity
Redeemable Noncontrolling Interest Common
Total redeemable noncontrolling interest which is reported separate from total temporary equity by an economic entity
Redeemable Noncontrolling Interest Other
Total redeemable noncontrolling interest which is reported separate from total temporary equity by an economic entity
Redeemable Noncontrolling Interest Preferred
Total redeemable noncontrolling interest which is reported separate from total temporary equity by an economic entity
Redeemable Noncontrolling Interest
Net Income (Loss) / Assets
Return on Assets (ROA)
Net Income (Loss) / Equity
Return on Equity (ROE)
Net Income (Loss) / Revenues
Return on Sales (ROS)
Revenues, Excluding Interest and Dividends
Revenues, Net of Interest Expense [Roll Up]
Revenues, Net of Interest Expense
Revenues [Roll Up]
Revenues

Statement of Comprehensive Income (Loss) [Line Items]
Statement of Comprehensive Income (Loss) [Table]
((Net Income (Loss) / Revenues) * (1+((Assets - Equity) / Equity))) / ((1 / (Revenues / Assets))-(((Net Income (Loss) / Revenues) * (1+(((Assets - Equity) / Equity))))))
Sustainable Growth Rate (SGR)
Total temporary equity of the economic entity; reported separately from redeemable noncontrolling interest
Temporary Equity Attributable to Parent
Total temporary equity of the economic entity; reported separately from redeemable noncontrolling interest
Temporary Equity
Trading symbol of economic entity issuing financial report
Trading Symbol
Total of all preferred stock dividends or other adjustments; used to arrive at net income (loss) attributable to common stockholders, basic
Undistributed Earnings (Loss) Allocated to Participating Securities, Basic
